AUROC=0.7190550133096718	AUPRC=0.7324200984035455	Accuracy=0.6421052631578947	MCC=0.28746180423392426	Recall=0.6020408163265306	Precision=0.6704545454545454	f1_score=0.6344086021505377

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.62      0.68      0.65       184
        case       0.67      0.60      0.63       196

    accuracy                           0.64       380
   macro avg       0.64      0.64      0.64       380
